name: TypeScript: A gentle introduction
description:
Session 1 : Introduction to TypeScript by Saamiyah - Front-end Coders
Session 2: How KDE is perfect for you! by Privi - LUGM

TypeScript is a typed superset of javascript. It can be used across the whole JavaScript ecosystem, and works well with frameworks such as Angular, React, Vue and NodeJS.

It has been designed to meet the needs of JavaScript programming teams that build and maintain large JavaScript programs.

Come join us to learn about TypeScript and improve your understanding of the language.

Speaker: Saamiyah ~ Software developer @ Maureva LTD

---------------------------------------------------------------
How KDE is perfect for you!

From the Big Bang to KDE

An overview of the Technology underneath KDE and what makes it tick
Advanced usage of a Desktop and what you have been missing all these years

Introduction to plasma, plasmoids and qml

If possible create a KDE Hello world app as well as a webapp.
Speaker: Pritvi Jheengut - The one and only
---------------------------------------------------------------

Session 3 : Surprise !
